column3: ## Update Request link behaviour for publisher and non-owner
Go to the public page of "Journal of Exoplanetary Biosignatures" at /toc/9556-2777.

column4: In the "Journal metadata" column, in the "Publisher" tile, a message is displayed "Are you associated with this journal? Help us keep your record accurate! Click here to submit an update."

column3: Click the "Click here to submit an update" link.

column4: A right-hand drawer opens displaying a login form.

column3: Log in as "Celestial Frontier Press" using the credentials provided on the testdrive page.

column4: The update request form for the journal "Journal of Exoplanetary Biosignatures" is displayed.

column3: Without logging out, return to the public page of "Journal of Exoplanetary Biosignatures".

column4: In the "Journal metadata" column, in the "Publisher" tile, a message is displayed "This is your journal! Help us keep your record accurate. Click here to submit an update."

column3: Click the "Click here to submit an update" link.

column4: The update request form for the journal "Journal of Exoplanetary Biosignatures" is displayed.

column3: Without logging out, go to the public page of "Annals of Stellar Habitat Studies" at /toc/9555-2777.

column4: In the "Journal metadata" column, in the "Publisher" tile, no update request link is displayed.

column3: Go to the public page of "Annals of Stellar Habitat Studies".

column4: In the "Journal metadata" column, in the "Publisher" tile, the update request link is displayed.

column3: Click the "Click here to submit an update" link.

column4: A right-hand drawer opens displaying a login form.

column3: Log in as "Celestial Frontier Press" using the credentials provided on the testdrive page.

column4: You are redirected to the "My journals" section of the Publisher Dashboard.
A message is displayed at the top of the page "You are not the owner of a journal you're trying to access. Here are the journals associated with your account."
